issue.title: [CF 1099] TellMeWhen cannot be loaded

> Posted by CurseForge user woolworthm | Imported from CurseForge issue #1099 | Raw

comments.body:
When you install the addon, you have to install the whole thing. That includes TellMeWhen AND TellMeWhen_Options.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
